name: Hunting of Magi Keep
description:
We don't choose our Fates

"The last mage on the continent,  Andrew has fled the pursing Templar for months now and they don’t seem to be letting up. He finds a crumbling church in the south and decides to rest there for now. However, an ancient power that sleeps in this ancient ruin has other plans for him and the Templar.

Can Andrew survive the fate that awaits everyone that sets foot here, will he even want to in the end…."

Game Features:

  • Manage your mana wisely. Drain life from plants and enemies often to survive.
  • Focus your spells and time your attacks to deal the most damage.
  • Solve the simple magical puzzles. Explore to find the proper spells and items to progress.
  • Discover the secrets of ancient mages through books, notes, and environmental storytelling.

Due to some complications, this is just a short demo of the idea. If you find any bugs or have ideas on how I can improve, comment below.
